r2_response: Received unconditional help From NGO/Religious institution
Changed eating patterns (relied on less preferred food options, reduced the proportion or number of meals per day, or household members skipped days of eating, etc.)
Employed household members took on more employment
Adult household members who were previously not working had to find work
Reduced expenditures on health and/or education
Engaged in spiritual efforts - prayer, sacrifices, divine consultations
